row.process:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!Check for node, cluster and server name
:IF &UC4RB_WAS_SCOPE# EQ "Cell" : SET &FLAG# = 0 : IF &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# NE 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Scope is selected as a Cell. So none of Node, Server or Cluster field value is allowed." : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_WAS_SCOPE# EQ "Cluster" : SET &FLAG# = 1 : IF &UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = &FLAG#-1 : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# NE 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Scope is selected as a Cluster. So Cluster is mandatory none of Server or Node field value is allowed." : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_WAS_SCOPE# EQ "Node" : SET &FLAG# = 1 : IF &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = &FLAG#-1 : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# NE 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Scope is selected as a Node. So Node is mandatory none of Server or Cluster field value is allowed." : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_WAS_SCOPE# EQ "Server" : SET &FLAG# = 2 : IF &UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = &FLAG#-1 : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = &FLAG#-1 : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#,1) : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# NE 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Scope is selected as a Server. So Node and Server both are mandatory and Cluster field value is not allowed." : ENDIF :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! Host : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Port : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Username : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Scope of Shared Library : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Scope" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_SCOPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Node Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Node Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Server Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Cluster Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Cluster Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Shared Library Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Shared Library" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_LIB_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Shared Library Description : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Shared Library Description" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_LIB_DESC#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Classpath : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Classpath" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_LIB_CLASSPATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Native Library path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Native Library Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_NAT_LIB_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Classloader Value : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Classloader" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_CLASS_LOADER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Advanced Options : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!-------------------------------------------------Forming the command-------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#/wsadmin.sh" PATH=$PATH:&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#;export PATH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION
: INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = "java -jar ""&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar"" arb -cmd execute &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"
! Username : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Password : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -password &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# <> "" ! Host : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#," -host &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Port : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -port &UC4RB_WAS_PORT#") : ENDIF
! Advanced Options : IF &UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS#") : ENDIF
! Attach python file to prepare running : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "ADD_NEW_SHARED_LIBRARY", T : SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_add_new_shared_library.py") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -f ""&FILENAME#""")
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#""") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#""")
! Scope : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_WAS_SCOPE#")
! Node Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Server Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Cluster Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Shared Library Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_LIB_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Shared Library Description : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_LIB_DESC#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Shared Library Classpath : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_LIB_CLASSPATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Native Library Path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_NAT_LIB_PATH#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Isolated Classloader : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_CLASS_LOADER#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! logging the command : PRINT &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** ADD NEW SHARED LIBRARY EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "********ADD NEW SHARED LIBRARY ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
